article.title: General Dynamics Receives Navy Contract for SPAWAR
article.author: Katie Packard
article.text: General Dynamics Information Technology is being awarded a $51 million indefinite delivery/indefinite quantity contract with a cost-plus-fixed-fee pricing arrangement to support the Space and Naval Warfare (SPAWAR) Systems Center Pacific Command, Control, Communications, Computers and Intelligence (C4I) Secure Voice and Defense Red Switch Network as well as information assurance and interoperability programs/systems.
